name: UniOfHull
text: Computer Science students starting in September are guaranteed a paid year in industry. 💰 *nl*  *nl* Students have previously worked at the likes of Microsoft, IBM and BT. 🖥️ *nl*  *nl* They will spend 3 months at @Lampada_DS, before heading on to other companies. *nl*  *nl* More 👇 *nl*  *nl* https://t.co/3k65OPpe6h
